title: To Bewitch A Highlander
description: ★★★★★ "I loved every moment of this series." ~ Kathryn G., Kindle Customer ★★★★★ "Scene over scene of Scottish awesome!" ~ Avid Reader, Kindle Customer ★★★★★ "Amazing Series!" ~ K Gin, Kindle Customer ★★★★★ "I just finished the series and was wowed!" ~ Kindle Customer She will protect her identity with her very life if necessary. Who will protect her from herself? Shoney's lightning speed with a bow captures Ronan by surprise, and their chance meeting ends with him lying unconscious at the bottom of a ravine. When he awakens, he cannot rid his mind of her startling beauty, her valor, or the secret fear he glimpsed in her steel eyes. He vows to find her, but as the mysteries of her identity unfold, his courage and heart are tested as never before. ★★★★★ "This book will have you laughing out loud...then crying like your heart is breaking." ~ Linda A., Kindle Customer ★★★★★ "I loved this beautiful story from the very beginning." ~ Elizabeth M., Kindle Customer. The Isle of Mull Series is an epic saga that spans three generations.
author: Lily Baldwin
